english_example_sentence: The young leader motivated the team by bravely leading new projects.
russian_example_sentence: Молодой лидер мотивировал команду, смело возглавляя новые проекты.
turkish_example_sentence: Genç lider, yeni projelere cesurca öncülük ederek ekibi motive etti.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Genç lider, yeni projelere cesurca ______ ekibi motive etti.
